chapter.title: The Apache UIMA Sandbox
chapter.para: UIMA is an open, industrial-strength, scaleable and extensible platform for creating, integrating and deploying unstructured information management solutions from powerful text or multi-modal analysis and search components.

The Apache UIMA Sandbox is a place where additional, optional components to Apache UIMA are developed. These components are of varying degrees of maturity. Some may be quite solid, but haven't made it into the core yet, for various reasons. Others may still be under construction. Please check the documentatio for the specific project for the developers' assessment of the state of the code.
